MU-MIMO“多用户多入多出”技术，与其依赖的Beamforming“波束成形: MU-MIMO "multi-user multi-input-multi-output" technology, combined with the "beamforming" beamforming technology on which it relies, allows the router to communicate with multiple terminals simultaneously, greatly increasing the efficiency of wireless resource utilization and expanding the capabilities of Wi -Fi. This feature must be supported by both the router and the terminal. Turning on the switch activates MU-MIMO and Beamforming.
重要提示：如果上级路由器不是小米路由器，它分配给中继路由器的管理后台地址可能会改: Important Note: If the upstream router is not a Xiaomi router, the background management address it assigns to the relay router may change, causing the background to be unavailable. It is recommended to install Xiaomi router mobile client and bind the current router to mobile phone control. Features.
PPTP（Point to Point Tunneling Protocol）和: PPTP (Point-to-Point Tunneling Protocol) and L2TP (Layer 2 Tunneling Protocol) are two Internet tunneling protocols, both of which refer to different classification methods for VPN (Virtual Private Network) protocols.
小米通讯技术有限公司（以下简称“小米”或“我们”）诚挚的邀请您加入“Redmi路: Xiaomi Communication Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as “Xiaomi” or “we”) sincerely invites you to join the “Redmi Router Series User Experience Improvement Program”. In order to provide you with a smarter life provided by next generation smart routers, we will compile statistics on the use of various product functions as needed, and then use these statistics to improve the products of the Redmi router series. Rest assured that we hate the disclosure of personal privacy as much as you do. All statistics only include the frequency and the way you use your Redmi router. This data is stored anonymously and will never be linked to the user's personal privacy data.
根据小米路由器系列产品的不断改进与更新，我们有可能会对本计划进行修改，届时将会在: In line with the continuous improvement and updating of the products of the Xiaomi router series, we may revise this plan and notify you about mobile applications (APP) for Xiaomi routers or router management (online). If you have not changed the status of the previous user experience improvement program, it means that you accept our changes and continue to join the program.

Wi-Fi 6是新一代的Wi-Fi技术，支持OFDMA等多种新功能，可使所连接的: Wi-Fi 6, also known as 802.11ax, is the next generation of Wi-Fi and the next step in continuous innovation. 目前路由器拨号上网获得的多半都是动态IP，DDNS可以将路由器变化的外网IP和固: Very often, Internet providers provide an external dynamic IP address (Stream, Beeline / Corbina, etc.) when connecting to a network. This is enough for the vast majority of users. However, in some cases (for network games, to access your computer from outside), an external static address is required. This service is not provided by all providers, and if they do, then for an additional fee. You can work around this problem by using DDNS technology, which allows you to associate an external dynamic IP address and a permanent domain name. DDNS is completely free!

踢除阈值：路由器检测到移动设备信号强度小于此值时，将强制已上线的设备下线;: Threshold: When the router detects that the signal strength of the mobile device is less than this value, it forces the online device to go offline;
开启DMZ功能可以将内网某一个设备的IP映射到外网，方便从外网访问到该设备。: A DMZ (Demilitarized Zone) is a network configuration in which publicly accessible servers are on a separate isolated network segment. This concept ensures that there is no contact between publicly accessible servers and other network segments in the event of a server compromise. When implementing the DMZ concept, a special role is assigned to the firewall, since it is he who is responsible for implementing the necessary policy to protect local networks from the DMZ segment while maintaining access to the DMZ. Due to the complexity of the implementation, it is not recommended to use DMZ technology if you are not sufficiently familiar with the principles of creating and operating networks. The use of DMZ technology is optional, but in most cases is recommended by network administrators who are serious about security.
踢除阈值：路由器检测到移动设备信号强度小于此值时，将强制已上线的设备下线: Threshold: If the router detects that the signal strength of the mobile device is less than this value, it will force the network device to disconnect
优先级模式下路由器会动态调整带宽分配，保证优先级较高的设备网络体验流畅: Priority mode, the router will dynamically adjust the bandwidth allocation to provide higher network equipment that takes priority
